name: The Masque of the Red Death
name_original: The Masque of the Red Death
description:
This game was created as a Final Project for American Literature I. It explores thematic elements of setting and ambiance, and audible elements described in the original text by Edgar Allan Poe. Much of the artwork was shamelessly borrowed from the internet and the links can be found below.

For educational purposes only.

Built in RPG Maker MV with the use of Adobe Photoshop and Audacity (for audio editing).
